positive_examples: This is an example of radiological weapon research facility.
The radiological weapon research facility demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed radiological weapon research facility in this context.
A typical case of radiological weapon research facility would involve these features.
The concept of radiological weapon research facility applies here.
A facility specializing in the development of radiological dispersal devices and dirty bombs.
negative_examples: This is an example of nuclear weapon research facility, not radiological weapon research facility.
This represents w m d weapons research facility in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NuclearWeaponResearchFacility, or other types of WMDWeaponsResearchFacility

definition: A facility researching weapons that disperse radioactive material.
